trans-unit.source: REST and Service Bus Relay Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: REST and Service Bus Relay Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: REST and Service Bus Relay Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: REST and Service Bus Relay Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: This walkthrough illustrates how to use REST-style Web service applications that use <token>sb1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This walkthrough illustrates how to use REST-style Web service applications that use <token>sb1</token>.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <token>indigo1</token> Web programming model to create and register a REST-style Web service for use with <token>sb2</token>, and then creates a REST client that invokes the REST service through <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: The example uses the <token>indigo1</token> Web programming model to create and register a REST-style Web service for use with <token>sb2</token>, and then creates a REST client that invokes the REST service through <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Creating a REST-based Application that uses Service Bus
trans-unit.target: Creating a REST-based Application that uses Service Bus

trans-unit.source: The basic tasks required to create an application that accesses <token>sb2</token> using the REST architecture model are as follows:
trans-unit.target: The basic tasks required to create an application that accesses <token>sb2</token> using the REST architecture model are as follows:

trans-unit.source: Create the <token>sb2</token> project and the <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create the <token>sb2</token> project and the <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: The project and namespace contain the resources to support your application.
trans-unit.target: The project and namespace contain the resources to support your application.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="67dfcf93-924a-47d7-bd3c-7037560f5ff5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Creating a .NET Services Account</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="67dfcf93-924a-47d7-bd3c-7037560f5ff5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Creating a .NET Services Account</link>.

trans-unit.source: REST applications must have a <token>sb2</token> project and namespace created by using the Azure management portal or the <externalLink><linkText>New-AzureSBNamespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn495165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> PowerShell cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: REST applications must have a <token>sb2</token> project and namespace created by using the Azure management portal or the <externalLink><linkText>New-AzureSBNamespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn495165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> PowerShell cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: Define the <token>sb2</token> contract.
trans-unit.target: Define the <token>sb2</token> contract.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.

trans-unit.source: If you are registering a REST-based service endpoint, you must implement the contract in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: If you are registering a REST-based service endpoint, you must implement the contract in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: Importantly, the information passed through the interface must be in a format that is transmittable by a REST-style service, for example, a stream.
trans-unit.target: Importantly, the information passed through the interface must be in a format that is transmittable by a REST-style service, for example, a stream.

trans-unit.source: Configure the service by specifying endpoint information and other behavior information.
trans-unit.target: Configure the service by specifying endpoint information and other behavior information.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.

trans-unit.source: For a full <token>sb2</token> application that supports the REST protocol, the main difference is that the application must use a binding that supports the REST protocol, such as <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.WebHttpRelayBinding</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: For a full <token>sb2</token> application that supports the REST protocol, the main difference is that the application must use a binding that supports the REST protocol, such as <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.WebHttpRelayBinding</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: However, other than that restriction, the actual configuration is identical to any other <token>indigo2</token> application that uses <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: However, other than that restriction, the actual configuration is identical to any other <token>indigo2</token> application that uses <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Build and run the service.
trans-unit.target: Build and run the service.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="5f8947bc-26c6-4b15-a3a4-74bd3a0edb58" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building a Service for the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="5f8947bc-26c6-4b15-a3a4-74bd3a0edb58" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building a Service for the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.

trans-unit.source: <token>crabout</token> creating a <token>sb2</token> service that supports the REST protocol, see <link xlink:href="e86c9562-eae5-49be-b156-c95edc7f19d1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Host a REST Listener through the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crabout</token> creating a <token>sb2</token> service that supports the REST protocol, see <link xlink:href="e86c9562-eae5-49be-b156-c95edc7f19d1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Host a REST Listener through the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.

trans-unit.source: Build a client application.
trans-unit.target: Build a client application.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="3468b3db-91b6-4e76-a5ff-216d4c765d05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building an AppFabric Service Bus Client Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="3468b3db-91b6-4e76-a5ff-216d4c765d05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building an AppFabric Service Bus Client Application</link>.
